name: everpatch
description:
everpatch (2018) is an unfinished platformy game with 4 levels and 2 characters. play with butterflies, collect coins, and soar through gravity wells.

Keyboard

Arrow keys - move

Shift - jump, select

Esc - pause menu

F11 - fullscreen

Controller

Left analog/D-pad - move

A - jump, select

Start - pause menu
